name: 書報討論（三）
restrict: ◎限本系(含雙主修)修習◎必須先修過【IWM0072  書報討論（一）】、【IWM0073  書報討論（二）】 ◎課程不開放上修
goals: 培養學生人力資源發展的專業能力 Cultivate students' professional ability of human resource development
Enhance communication and counseling competence for human resource work
強化國際視野與溝通能力 Strengthen international vision and communication skills
prerequisite: ◎Exclusive for students within this department(including dual degree program)Prerequisite course: 【IWM0072  Seminar on Human Resource Development (I)】、【IWM0073  Seminar on Human Resource Development (II)】 ◎Unavailable for M.A. program students (M.A. program courses excepted) and B.A. program students.
